website_summaries.verdict: Beats on-ear Bluetooth headphone has lot going for it, but it doesn't quite justify its lofty price tag.
pros: The Beats Solo 2 Wireless is a well-built wireless headphone that sounds good in both wireless and wired modes and is relatively comfortable to wear for an on-ear headphone
Its battery life is decent and has a remote control built-in to the right earcup that's easy to operate by feel
cons: doesn't sound quite as good as the Bose SoundLink On-Ear Bluetooth, which costs $50 less

customer_reviews.title: I got WIRED instead of WIRELESS..
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that I purchased WIRELESS headphones but got WIRED. As you can clearly see from my photo, box even says WIRLESS & I paid 229 for them ... I'm really unhappy as this is the one gift my son wanted for Christmas ... If I wanted wired, I would have purchased wired for significantly less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Beats purchase, I couldn’t be happier. The attention to detail, quality and design are well worth the price. Being refurbished they didn’t come in the original box, but that wasn’t important to me. The sound is amazing and being cordless makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 14 year old son. The sound is good and they look brand new. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: J Cooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these bad boys with a 4 year protection plan. Very satisfied with the product and service people.
customer_reviews.author: marty Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working shortly after the 90-day warranty wore out.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for xmas. I received it on November 14th but he did not get it until December 31st. He used it for only two months and now they are not turning on. the warranty expired on February 12th and now I am out the money and my son has no headphones. NOT HAPPY. Expected better from Amazon and the Beat brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought This is for my daughter for Christmas. First time she went to use it the left earphone was defective. I returned it and went to Best Buy and bought a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A La Fevre

customer_reviews.title: Go buy real Beats, save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Beats?? More like Deats. These are not real. They came bouncing around in a ziplock bag. Good bye. I’m absolutely livid. My son turns 16 and these have no box. Wires tossed inside. They will be returned today which is the same day I received them. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Needs additional parts to work properly
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in original packaging and appeared to be in good condition at first. After further inspection one of the earpads was torn and they only worked when plugged into the charger, but not wirelessly. It ended up that the battery would not hold a charge. After ordering a new battery and replacement earpads it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: VLow

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with Hearing Issues!!
customer_reviews.text: I can bluetooth these from my Iphone and get the sound I want!! Hard to find headphones that have enough gusto!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Beats headphones sound cuts in and out, ear pieces disintegrating,. I take care of my electronics
customer_reviews.text: Beats headphones are falling apart, in many ways; Ear pads disintegrated, sound cuts in and out. I take great care with my electronics I’ve not had this low level of workmanship in pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hill

customer_reviews.title: Totaly worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love these wireless head phones. The battery life is outstanding and the sound quality is amazing. You will not regret this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were a gift for my daughter, it was missing a chord but I contacted the seller and they shipping one out to me. Over all good headphones
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: beats solo 2 he
customer_reviews.text: Although it did not come in original packaging it looks brand new and after googling how to use it and connect to my phone it was amazing! It comes with serial numbers so you can check its authenticity. I would definitely reccomend buying the beats solo 2 headphones they are worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: David Park

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I’ve had these a few months and it’s like they’re brand new still.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: One charge last almost over a week of use if you only use it a couple hrs a day it will last over a week perfect for working out
customer_reviews.author: it's a great game

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 13 year old daughter for her birthday she absolutely loved it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ms Alabama

customer_reviews.title: dont do it
customer_reviews.text: the product arriver and was damage. looked like someone had stept on them. would not hold a charge so you had to leave the power cord on at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable case. I purchased for my 11yo grandson for a Christmas present. He is a typical boy and handles a lot of things roughly. This case will endure all the roughness.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Did not last!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Beats headphones. His first pair lasted just over a year, then stopped working. I bought these refurbished...and they didn't even last 6 months! :(
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Reid

customer_reviews.title: Refurb doesn’t matter
customer_reviews.text: Exactly was my kid asked for Christmas. Hasn’t stopped using them for two days. I like the ability to be both wireless and wired.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Product just was working for 1mont, and then doesn’t work anymore! Product used on bad condition.
customer_reviews.author: Rafaela M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I bought them for a Christmas present and they don’t even turn on! Been charging them for hours and they immediately shut off! I’m pissed! Do not waste your money. Crap!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Murtha

customer_reviews.title: Wired not wireless
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is wired not wireless as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: That they work like it said it will
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t use them yet. But it looks like a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: 😜
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. The sound is great and they look cool to.
customer_reviews.author: Martrail carad

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair in two years
customer_reviews.text: They don't last. I have purchased 3 of them. 2 of which were a warranty return. The last of which I am done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a matter of if, just when
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones until they stop working, which they are highly known to do. Mine lasted about 16 months and I could not be happier. Then the right side started going intermittent and then finally stopped working altogether. I took excellent care of these headphones and rarely used them other than for traveling. $300 headphones should last a lot longer than 50-60 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Skye C.

product_meta.title: Beats by Dr. Dre Beats Solo 2 Headphones Bluetooth Wireless Headphone On Ear | Noise Cancelling | for iOS & Android - Black (Renewed)
product_meta.description: Color:blackBeats by Dr. Dre Solo2 Wireless headphone’s durable housing and compact, foldable design makes it the ultimate on-the-go accessory. Whether you’re on the subway, dancing in your living room, or at your desk, you won’t have to worry about getting tangled up in cords. Plus, if you run out of power, plug in the cable to make it work as wired headset for unlimited playback. This premium headphone is ready for your life, wherever it may go.
feature_bullets: On The Go: Beats Solo2 Wireless has 12 hours of playback after only 2 hours of charging, enjoy wireless music up to a distance of 30 feet.

Wireless Freedom: Unplug your Beats Solo 2 Bluetooth Wireless, pair with your bluetooth device from iOS, Mac, PC, Android, Windows and other bluetooth devices. Use the "b" button on the left earcup to control your music, take phone calls and more.
Feel the Music: The Beats by Dr. Dre Solo2 bluetooth headphones wireless brings the award winning sound from beats. It has a dynamic wider range of sound and enhanced clarity.

Design For You: Ergonomically lightweight angled headphone redesigned with unique curvature, the Beats Solo2 is comfortable to wear. Its compact, foldable design that makes it the ideal on-the-go accessory.
What's In The Box: Beats Solo2 Wireless Headphone | Remote Talk Cable To Control Your Music And Take Calls | Universal USB Charging Cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
